description: This source file is a Dart script that automates the process of discovering the Flutter project root directory and running 'flutter pub get' and 'flutter analyze' commands sequentially, based on scanning the filesystem for pubspec.yaml files with Flutter SDK dependencies.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the script that discovers the Flutter project root and executes 'flutter pub get' and 'flutter analyze'.

methods.name: _looksLikeFlutterProject
methods.description: Checks if a directory contains a pubspec.yaml indicating it's a Flutter project.

methods.name: _scanForFlutterProject
methods.description: Recursively scans directories up to a specified depth to locate a Flutter project directory.
